long_description: Built with a steel barrel, varnished wood handle and an extra-long rubber hose, the Lezyne Sport Floor Drive Pump offers easy pumping for fast, efficient filling of your bike tubes. Durable steel barrel and piston, stable fiber-reinforced plastic base and comfortable varnished wood handle combine for easy, high-pressure pumping. 43 in. extra-long rubber hose makes it easy to inflate tires, even if your bike is still on the stand. Flip-Thread chuck threads directly onto Presta or Schrader valves for a secure, airtight connection. Air bleed system cleverly eliminates chance of unthreading removable Presta valves; also lets you adjust tire pressure when inflating via Schrader valves. Large, floor-level 2.5 in. gauge is easy to view and is integrated into the stable, 3-leg base, which is made out of a reinforced plastic. Lezyne Sport Floor Drive Pump has a maximum inflation pressure of 160 psi (11 bar).
short_description: Built with a steel barrel, varnished wood handle and an extra-long rubber hose, the Lezyne Sport Floor Drive Pump offers easy pumping for fast, efficient filling of your bike tubes.
